A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Major Disappointment.  Editing is both lacking and poorly executed. Character's personalities (compared to the Force Awakens) are either backwards or randomly warped.  Not enough action.  Comparable to the let down for Star Wars fans who didn't like the prequels. Too much hype around theories and as a devoted Star Wars fan this movie was a major let down. Rian Johnson ruined the narrative arc setup in TFA.
